title: Herman's Hermits - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 5/22/20
itunes:title: Herman's Hermits - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 5/22/20
description:
Guest host Ian Punnett and singer Peter Noone of the 1960's rock group Herman's Hermits recount some of the highlights of his career, including recording with David Bowie, escapades with Tom Jones, and why he continues to find joy in his sixty years in the music industy.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
